heading: Content Block 14
summary: Women's CenterIf you need support in accessing reproductive health services as well as support in navigating the health system or you need services dedicated to victims of domestic violence, click here.Ask for help

heading: Content Block 15
summary: Counseling for people living with HIVIf you arrive in Romania and need free, anonymous and confidential psycho-medical-social HIV services, you can receive the support of specialist doctors from 10 Regional HIV Centers in Romania, the expertise and support of Sens Pozitiv.Ask for help
